title: REGISTER_RESOURCE_ASSET
content:
0x9862B266// RegisterResourceAsset
char* REGISTER_RESOURCE_ASSET(char* resourceName, char* fileName);Parameters:resourceName: The resource to add the asset to.fileName: A file name in the resource.Returns: A cache string to pass to REGISTER_STREAMING_FILE_FROM_CACHE on the client.Experimental: This native may be altered or removed in future versions of CitizenFX without warning.Registers a cached resource asset with the resource system, similar to the automatic scanning of the stream/ folder.
codeBlocks:
// RegisterResourceAsset
char* REGISTER_RESOURCE_ASSET(char* resourceName, char* fileName);
